xtream.query

Class MaxWindowAgg

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtream.query.AOperator
      • xtream.query.ATumblingWindowAggregation
        • xtream.query.MaxWindowAgg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInPort, IIOPort, ILSStore, IOperator, IOutPort

    public class MaxWindowAgg
extends ATumblingWindowAggregation
    This is a Tumbling Time/Tuple Window Aggregate to retrieve a tuple with max value among IAggTuples
    Author:
    ghalambor

      • MaxWindowAgg

        public MaxWindowAgg(long timeWindowSize,
                    long tupleWindowSize,
                    java.lang.String opName,
                    IQuery parentQuery)
        Parameters:
        timeWindowSize - size of time window (millisec), 0 to make it inactive
        tupleWindowSize - size of tuple-based window, 0 to make it inactive
        opName - unique name for operator
        parentQuery - ref to parent query
